description: This is some handwritten notes, left by another 'player' like you. Maybe there's something useful to be gleaned from them.

Some various papers (ranging from printed emails to handwritten documents) from a company you don't recognize. Most are dry and seemingly mundane company stuff, but there might be some interesting reading here.

Some loose data a quotidian left behind after deeming it non-DANGEROUS that's become a solid substance due to the nature of...wherever you are.

Holding it in your hand, it has the texture of the concept of alternating yes's and no's to create coherent results.
Random fruit, cut up into bitesize hunks. Would be a nice treat for anything that enjoys fruit.

A band of gold with a smooth piece of some kind of material set into it.  A strange worm is carved into it, making a perfect spiral with its sealed body. This isn't yours, why do you have it? Were you looking through someone else's things?
